alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 9:07PM MDT until July 09 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Garfield County in northeastern Montana... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 907 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Mosby to 7 miles southeast of Sand Springs to 25 miles south of Edwards, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jordan, Sand Springs, Hell Creek Rec Area, Edwards, Cohagen, Mosby, Brusett, Hillside and Steve Fork. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
